reviewText: Good story of a great artist.

I love Norman Rockwell's work. This dvd is great and the documentary is also great!
I am a freelance illustrator. I have seen this several times already since I purchased it. It is a source of inspiration and encouragement when I get stuck while painting.
Brand new item. Lives up to the American Masters series. Would recommend this to anyone. Sound and picture quality excellent. Definitely worth the money.
It is great joy seeing this production honoring Norman Rockwell's life - revealing the process of his process
